stimulusHtml:
Part A

The graph of  h MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiAaaaa@3885@ and its dashed midline for two full cycles is shown. Five points,  F ,  G ,  J ,  K , and  P , are labeled on the graph. No scale is indicated, and no axes are presented.

Determine possible coordinates  t , h t  for the five points:  F ,  G ,  J ,  K , and  P .

  • Moving from left to right:
    • Point F is at a maximum point.
    • Point G is on the midline.
    • Point J is at a minimum point.
    • Point K is on the midline.
    • Point P is at a maximum point.

features.html:
• The robotic arm is rectangular in shape and is labeled Arm.
  • The arm is attached to a circular piece that allows the arm to rotate in a counterclockwise, circular motion.
  • Attached to the circular piece is a rectangular base that extends to the level surface.
  • There are several labels in the figure.
    • Point S is on the tip of the Arm.
    • Point X is on the base.
    • The Counterclockwise rotation direction for the Arm is indicated with a dashed circle.
    • The vertical distance between point X and point S is labeled Height Above X.
    • The vertical distance from point X to the highest point on the dashed circle, located above X, is 20.
    • The vertical distance from point X to the lowest point on the dashed circle, located below X, is negative 6.
  • Note that the figure is not drawn to scale.

The figure shows a robotic arm rotating in a circular counterclockwise direction that completes one rotation every 2 seconds. Point S is on the tip of the arm, and point X does not move. As the arm rotates at a constant speed, the height of S above X periodically increases and decreases. At time t=0 seconds, S is at its lowest position, 6 inches directly below X. At its highest position, S is 20 inches directly above X. 

The sinusoidal function  h  models the height of  S  above X, in inches, as a function of time  t , in seconds. A positive value of  h t  indicates S is above X; a negative value of ht indicates S is below X.

Part B

stimulusHtml:
Part C

Refer to the graph of h MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiAaaaa@3885@ in part (A). The t MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiAaaaa@3885@ -coordinate of K MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiAaaaa@3885@ is t 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiDamaaBaaaleaacaaIXaaabeaaaaa@3978@ , and the t MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiAaaaa@3885@ -coordinate of P is t 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiDamaaBaaaleaacaaIXaaabeaaaaa@3978@ .

(i) On the interval  ( t 1 , t 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D76@ , which of the following is true about  h MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiAaaaa@3885@ ?

  2. h MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiAaaaa@3885@ is positive and decreasing.
  3. h MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiAaaaa@3885@ is negative and increasing.
  4. h MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiAaaaa@3885@ is negative and decreasing.

(ii) On the interval ( t 1 , t 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D76@ , describe the concavity of the graph of  h MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiAaaaa@3885@ and determine whether the rate of change of  h MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiAaaaa@3885@ is increasing or decreasing.
